name: Funky Attraction
description:
In this magnetic Yogscast 2021 Game Jam submission, you play as 2 magnets trying to make it through each level.  You will rotate from node to node and based on your polarity, you will either connect or bounce.  Make it to the end of each level avoiding  hazards, collecting yellow nodes, using both your puzzle solving skills and your dexterity to make it to the end of each level.

How To Play:

  • "SPACE" key switches the Magnets polarity (opposites attract)
  • "SHIFT" key allows you to bypass nodes (no polarity)
  • "R" hold down R to reset a level

Design and Developed by:

  • Mark Porter - Development
  • Jerry Berg - Design

Music:

  • Paradox by | e s c p | https://escp-music.bandcamp.com
